snippet.textDisplay: It's really a shame you didn't developed further the Maya version of Corona... This would have such an impact, especially when you see vray starting with a kind of cloud based licensing and so on... Corona Render is beautiful.
snippet.textOriginal: It's really a shame you didn't developed further the Maya version of Corona... This would have such an impact, especially when you see vray starting with a kind of cloud based licensing and so on... Corona Render is beautiful.

snippet.textDisplay: Sadly not possible to develop Corona for any other application without slowing down development massively  for the existing versions (it's not related to licensing, just to development manpower, and how much work it takes to get a render engine working within another host software, which is very significant :) ). Thanks! Tom
